sourcesContent:
import '../styles/postcard.css' export default function PostMusicCard({ card, setAudio }) { const {_id, name, author, file, albumCover, albumId } = card const domain = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_SERVICE}/musics/${albumId}` function loadAudio() { const audio = new Audio(`${domain}/${file}`) setAudio(audio) } return (
{ (albumCover !== "") ?
:
}

{name}

{author}

favorite 0
0
download
) }
